summary: In post-WW2 Berlin, when travel to the East was still possible, the sister of a British officer from West-Berlin is abducted by Communist agents and taken into the Soviet-sector where her eventual rescue is arranged by a German smuggler.
cast: James Mason|Claire Bloom|Hildegard Knef|Geoffrey Toone|Aribert Wäscher|Ernst Schröder|Dieter Krause|Hilde Sessak|Karl John|Ljuba Welitsch|Eberhard Fechner|Reinhard Kolldehoff|Frederick Schiller|Robert Brooks Turner
title: Se interpone un hombre
